title: Python
description: Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language known for its simplicity and readability.

title: Java
description: Java is a class-based, object-oriented language used in enterprise applications, Android development, and more.

title: C++
description: C++ is a powerful, high-performance programming language often used in game development, embedded systems, and system software.

title: Go
description: Go (Golang) is a statically typed language created by Google for building reliable and efficient software.

title: Rust
description: Rust is a systems programming language focused on safety, speed, and concurrency, without a garbage collector.

title: C#
description: C# is a modern, object-oriented language developed by Microsoft, commonly used for Windows applications and game development with Unity.

title: Ruby
description: Ruby is a dynamic, open-source programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity, known for Ruby on Rails.

title: Swift

title: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing, making large-scale application development more robust.
